ygData.subject: Just wondering . . .
ygData.msgSnippet: Hello, I am new to this club and just wanted to say... hi. Sadly EQ is my life, heh, but what the heck, I m not complaining! I love everquest =P Anyways,
ygData.messageBody:
Hello, I am new to this club and just wanted to
say... hi.<br>Sadly EQ is my life, heh, but what the
heck, I'm not complaining! I love everquest
=P<br>Anyways, I was just wondering if anyone plays on the
Erollisi Marr or Karana server? All my eq buddies are away
for a couple of months and I HATE soloing! And
there's only so long you can sit in EC before going crazy
=/<br><br>Karana<br>- Kailicien Wolfguard 40 druid<br>- Sakkren
Iznotsuggar 21 sk<br><br>EMarr<br>- Zakazee Soulstealer 22
sk<br>- Shissyre 3 monk
